Name: Vampire Prince
Text: Salutations! I heard this is a place where one may procure magical wares, no?

Name: Vampire Prince
Text: If so, then I request your aid in an issue of most importance. A gala shall be held soon that I must attend, and many of the attendees shall be undead of great significance.

Name: Vampire Prince
Text: As such, everyone will be on high alert for even the smallest hint of that which is un-dandy. Please, oh please do help me ensure that I do not walk out into that crowd dressed as an utter ninny, I beg of you!

Name: Tired Witch
Text: ...So, you want something to make sure you don't look like a dork in front of everyone?

Name: Vampire Prince
Text: Umm, err, yes, if you would be so kind.
